title: Teku/Besu synced, but my validator appears red on Beaconchan page.
body:
Hi, here is the log.


* Software version: [`teku --23.8.0`]
* Java version: [`17+`]
* OS Name & Version: [`Ubuntu 22.04 LTS`]
* Cloud VM, type, size: [GCP - E2 (vCORE8 /32GB) ]
